arts.ttl: Ecuador vs. New Zealand broadcast – Time and channel to watch the match
arts.sum: Ecuador faces New Zealand this Wednesday at 2:30 AM CET. The match will be played at the Sports Illustrated Stadium in a friendly. One Paris Saint-Germain player will be playing for Ecuador: Willian Pacho (24-year-old defender). Find information about the broadcast of this Ecuador vs. New Zealand match here.
